Add support for CloudInstanceInfoProcessor and CloudInstanceInfo from an external package when using CUSTOMIZED cloud provider.

Thanks @junkaixue for reviewing and approving the change. This change is ready to be merged.
Commit message - add the test case for n - n+1

Since the watcher is one-time, I don't think we consider this a leakage, right?

Moreover, I suspect that if we can track all ZK watchers, and do we really need to do it? If user calls unsubscribeChildChanges 10 mins after subscribeChildChanges, the watcher will still become untracked, right?

I assume the goal is to ensure all the existing watchers are tracked by _childListener map? For achieving this goal, I guess some GC mechanism works better. And in reality, the watchers only have a long life when they are watching non-exist paths (so no update), or very stable paths. Seems low risk to me. Do we have more detail about the potential user impact?

LGTM. Good PR!
Please address the exception related comments in following change.

Commit Message: Fix the CI failure caused by metrics not being updated immediately.

This is good to see chaos engineering in Helix! But one thing I would suggest: if you would like to introduce this Puppy, let's have general Puppy skeleton and implementation in one PR.  Put the Puppy with concrete testing in a different PR. That can keep the logic clean.
